full_summary:
### R8200 Communications System Analyzer with VNA or Equivalent

#### Solicitation Information
* Solicitation Reference: cb-8461-4935227
* Solicitation Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: 202401817
* Publication Date: August 24, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 7, 2023, 2:00 PM ET
* Amendment Date: September 7, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: September 14, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

#### Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking to acquire a communications system analyzer with Vector Network Analyzer (VNA) capabilities or an equivalent device. The requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under supply arrangement E60HN-16ELEC/XXX/HN qualified under Stream 2: Electronic Products.

#### Products Required
* R2800 Communications System Analyzer with VNA capabilities
* AutoTune for APX8000/8500
* AutoTune for Harris XG-75/P7300/M7300 Series Mobiles and Portables
* APCO Project 25 Phase 1
* Audio Breakout Box for Motorola Radios
* Breakout Box for Motorola APX & XTL Mobile AutoTune Audio Tests
* Accessory Kit for Harris XG-75 Series & P7300 Portables or equivalent

#### Tendering and Evaluation Criteria
* Tendering: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Delivery: All products must be delivered on or before March 31, 2024

#### Contact Information
* Name: Olivia McCarthy
* Email: [olivia.mccarthy@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:olivia.mccarthy@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 574-7219

#### Documents and Attachments
The Solicitation Document and attached Bid Solicitation Document are available for download from the Canada Buys website. 

#### Tender Status
All interested parties are invited to submit proposals to the RCMP Procurement Officer. The tender closing date is September 7, 2023, 2:00 PM ET. Only Supply Arrangement Holders under supply arrangement E60HN-16ELEC/XXX/HN qualified under Stream 2: Electronic Products may submit a proposal.

#### Language of Communication
The language of the Solicitation
